string-array.name: fullchangelog
string-array.item: @array/v49
@array/v48

string-array.name: v49
string-array.item: version.release.fourtynine
Get IncallUI ready for Android 5.1
Fix Google+ Photos not having proper statusbar
Darken Instagram Camera View
Instagram button accent colors
Gmail Reply/Forward Icons
Fix Black on Location in G+ Button
Revert G+ to red again
Google+ Events all greyed out
Reverted Google+ to red again
Changed Google+ Ripple Color
Grey Google+ Events fix
Fix theme app\'s nav bar color
Dropbox White Underline, due to FW, fixed
Darkened bliss logo added into status bar
Reintroduce LightFlow, reddened
Reintroduce Pushbullet, greenified
Configure Settings style for Google Camera
CPU Spy Menu Background has a black border
Completely invert Gmail thanks to Google\'s new exposes
Readjusted Contacts Actionbar color to fix Frequently Contacted title in Contacts - linked to primary_color
Chrome close tab icon grey -> white
Pandora rich notification with Pandora patcher, notification background is white
Theme Delayed Lock by Javelin, problem with checkboxes
Google Play Music Unreadable Widget
Fix up whitened dialog in latest Chainfire\'s Recently App
Keep hardkey menu
Increase readability in keep: Grey text to Blackish Grey
Keep drawer header titles and divider colors
Keep new drawer icons for labels
Retheme DocumentsUI drawer text and icons

string-array.name: v48
string-array.item: version.release.fourtyeight
Added new app into Theme package
Theme BlissOTA
Touch up CM File Manager\'s Default Colors (To fix black on black, this has to be changed by the user in Color Scheme Options (Click on text color, then press OK without making any changes)
G+ logo and Add Contact Picture in Play Store
Leave Hangout Button Invert
